### News and Blog Posts

- Dr. Grady was quoted in a Law360 analysis of [What The Fedsâ€™ Colo. River Plan Could Mean For The West](https://www.law360.com/articles/1597564/what-the-feds-colo-river-plan-could-mean-for-the-west).
- Dr. Grady was quoted in a [Marketplace report](https://www.marketplace.org/2022/08/18/how-drought-zaps-electricity-production-and-drives-up-prices/) on how drought could zap electricity production and raise prices.
- Dr. Grady and PhD student Lauren Dennis co-authored an article on [climate change and hydropower for The Conversation](https://theconversation.com/hydropowers-future-is-clouded-by-droughts-floods-and-climate-change-its-also-essential-to-the-us-electric-grid-182314).
- Dr. Grady and Lauren Dennis were [interviewed on WORT](https://www.wortfm.org/how-hydropower-impacts-the-electric-grid/) about how hydropower impacts the electric grid.
- FEWsLab articles were featured in the Global Water Forum blogs on [climate adaptation](https://globalwaterforum.org/2022/06/08/for-the-future-of-food-energy-and-water-security-how-are-we-adapting-to-climate-change/) and [language use in water resources research](https://globalwaterforum.org/2022/05/25/watery-research-boundaries-why-the-language-we-use-to-describe-our-water-research-matters/).
